sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the "Illinois Coal
Transfers to Coal Technology Development Assistance Fund.
sections.text: Transfers to Coal Technology Development Assistance Fund.

sections.heading: The Department shall have the following powers and duties:
sections.text: The Department shall have the following powers and duties:

sections.heading: Coal demonstration and commercialization project.
sections.text:
No expenditure
from the Fund may be made for any coal
demonstration and commercialization project until it has been approved by the
Department with the advice and recommendation
of the Board.
